title: `brew desc --search /foo.*bar/` causes Error: undefined method `match?' for ["RegExhibit", "Perl regex assistant"]:Array

labels.name: outdated
labels.description: PR was locked due to age

body:
### `brew config` output

```shell
$ brew config
HOMEBREW_VERSION: 3.4.8
ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/brew
HEAD: c2eaeed0b5978ef3e455cc29dda7e9e0b7a0670f
Last commit: 4 days ago
Core tap ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core
Core tap HEAD: 23a754deb53e4df9b02b581c0075227a34764de6
Core tap last commit: 47 minutes ago
Core tap branch: master
HOMEBREW_PREFIX: /opt/homebrew
HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS: []
HOMEBREW_CORE_GIT_REMOTE: https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core
HOMEBREW_EDITOR: editor_subl
HOMEBREW_GITHUB_API_TOKEN: set
HOMEBREW_GITHUB_PACKAGES_TOKEN: set
HOMEBREW_GITHUB_PACKAGES_USER: luckman212
HOMEBREW_INSTALL_FROM_API: set
HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS: 8
HOMEBREW_NO_ENV_HINTS: set
HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT: set
Homebrew Ruby: 2.6.8 => /System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/2.6/usr/bin/ruby
CPU: octa-core 64-bit arm_firestorm_icestorm
Clang: 13.1.6 build 1316
Git: 2.36.0 => /opt/homebrew/bin/git
Curl: 7.79.1 => /usr/bin/curl
macOS: 12.3.1-arm64
CLT: 13.3.1.0.1.1648687083
Xcode: 13.3.1
Rosetta 2: false
```


### `brew doctor` output

```shell
$ brew doctor
Your system is ready to brew.
```


### Verification

- [X] I ran `brew update` and am still able to reproduce my issue.
- [X] I have resolved all warnings from `brew doctor` and that did not fix my problem.

### What were you trying to do (and why)?

trying to search formulae descriptions with a regex, which I have been doing for a long time

### What happened (include all command output)?

it printed an error in the `Casks` section, e.g.

```
$ brew desc --search /disk.*space/
==> Formulae
agedu: Unix utility for tracking down wasted disk space
diskonaut: Terminal visual disk space navigator
dua-cli: View disk space usage and delete unwanted data, fast
kondo: Save disk space by cleaning non-essential files from software projects
pnpm: ðŸ“¦ðŸš€ Fast, disk space efficient package manager

==> Casks
Error: undefined method `match?' for ["RegExhibit", "Perl regex assistant"]:Array
Please report this issue:
  https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/searchable.rb:27:in `block (2 levels) in search_regex'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/searchable.rb:27:in `any?'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/searchable.rb:27:in `block in search_regex'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cache_store.rb:99:in `select'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cache_store.rb:99:in `select'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/description_cache_store.rb:90:in `select'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/searchable.rb:24:in `search_regex'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/searchable.rb:11:in `search'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/descriptions.rb:25:in `search'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/desc.rb:81:in `block in desc'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cache_store.rb:26:in `use'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/desc.rb:79:in `desc'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/brew.rb:110:in `<main>'
```


### What did you expect to happen?

no error

### Step-by-step reproduction instructions (by running `brew` commands)

```shell
$ brew desc --search /disk.*space/
```
